casebody.data:
State
v.
Sethy Tony Seam 82A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 30, 2016 Charles H. Harp, II, Attorney at Law, Lexington, Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Seam, Sethy Tony. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Staples Hughes, Durham. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, for Seam, Sethy Tony. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of December 2016 by Defendant to Expedite Mandate: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2016." Ervin, J. recused
